title: Advanced Timer - Android Wear
summary: Simple and easy to use timer for Android Wear.

description: With the advanced timer for Android Wear you are able to set a specific timer on your Android Wear watch quickly. The timer runs in background and is visible via a notification card. Over this card you view timer status and you are able to edit, restart, or stop the timer. This app is simple and easy to use and a great helper for on the go. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start timer.Get more apps, games & news about Android Wear with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxsFeatures:★ Set hours, minutes and seconds of the timer★ Edit, restart or close the timer via notification cardPlease note:-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Timer" or say "Start timer"Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
descriptionHTML:
With the advanced timer for Android Wear you are able to set a specific timer on your Android Wear watch quickly. The timer runs in background and is visible via a notification card. Over this card you view timer status and you are able to edit, restart, or stop the timer. This app is simple and easy to use and a great helper for on the go. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start timer.


Get more apps, games & news about Android Wear with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxs


Features:
★ Set hours, minutes and seconds of the timer
★ Edit, restart or close the timer via notification card


Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.
-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Timer" or say "Start timer"


Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
comments: Needs more work I like it - needs improved user interface for use on watch.  I use it while working out, which means quick glances at the screen to see time remaining.  Unfortunately, the small font is difficult to make out in this fashion.  Also, the timer end vibration needs to be longer, so not confused with other notifications.  Thanks, Sam

Would be great but... Useless when it doesn't buzz with the screen dimmed. 4 star if that was fixed.   **was replied to by wearable software that the problem was fixed and to re-install and review again. The alarm will indeed buzz now when the watch screen is dimmed, the notification is delayed anywhere from 3-4 seconds late to 45 seconds late. Bumped up my review a little as now it has some use for me, would be nice if it was a consistent on time buzz when the timer was up.

At first use I thought this was great.  It did everything I wanted.  However,  it didn't buzz when the screen was off  so in effect was useless.  Please fix this and I would give five stars. .  However,  no use as it stands.
It's not fully functional When the screen is of the watch doesn't vibrate when timer reaches zero
Not bad,... but it needs to vibrate a bit longer (one short buzz at the moment). A dismiss action would be nice.

Does not notify Does not always notify when time is up.  Lg g watch r.  Would be great if worked properly.  Nice and simple and does job.  Shows time past set time which is great.  Just fix notification and will give 5 stars.
recentChanges: - vibration now available in silent mode
